q1.question: How does the pricing work?
q1.answer: We charge per project, not per month. For photo enhancement, you pay â‚¬24.50 per property (up to 30 images) - that's 50% off our regular â‚¬49 price for our launch year! Prices are excluding VAT. No subscriptions, no hidden fees.

q2.question: What image formats do you support?
q2.answer: We support all common image formats including JPG, PNG, and WEBP. Maximum file size is 10MB per image. Enhanced images are delivered in high-resolution JPG format.

q3.question: How long does processing take?
q3.answer: Photo enhancement typically takes under 30 seconds per image. Video creation usually takes 5-10 minutes depending on the number of images and selected options.

q4.question: Can I try before I buy?
q4.answer: Yes! New users get free credits to try out the platform. You can enhance a few images to see the quality before committing to a full property project.

q5.question: What if I have more than 30 images?
q5.answer: If your property has more than 30 images, you can create multiple projects or contact us for custom pricing on larger shoots.

q6.question: Do you offer refunds?
q6.answer: If you're not satisfied with the results, contact us within 24 hours of processing and we'll work with you to make it right or provide a refund.

about.title: Making property photos look incredible
about.subtitle: VastgoedFotoAI.nl is an AI-powered photo enhancement platform built specifically for real estate professionals. We help agents, photographers, and property managers create stunning visuals that sell properties faster.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: We started VastgoedFotoAI.nl because we saw a gap in the market. Real estate professionals needed high-quality photo enhancement, but existing solutions were either too expensive, too slow, or required technical expertise.
story.p2: Professional photography services can cost hundreds of dollars per property and take days to deliver. DIY editing tools require hours of learning and manual work. Neither option works when you have multiple listings and tight deadlines.
story.p3: VastgoedFotoAI.nl bridges this gap. Our AI understands real estate photography. It knows how to brighten rooms, enhance curb appeal, and make properties look their absolute best. All automatically, in seconds.
story.p4: Today, we've processed over 50,000 images for real estate professionals. Our users report up to 85% higher engagement on their listings. And we're just getting started.

qualityFirst.title: Quality First
qualityFirst.description: Every image we process meets professional standards. We never compromise on the output quality.

speedMatters.title: Speed Matters
speedMatters.description: Real estate moves fast. Our AI delivers results in seconds, not hours or days.

builtForYou.title: Built for You
builtForYou.description: Designed specifically for real estate professionals. Every feature solves a real problem.

simplePricing.title: Simple Pricing
simplePricing.description: No subscriptions, no hidden fees. Pay only for what you use, when you use it.

mission.title: Empowering real estate professionals
mission.description: Our mission is to democratize professional-quality real estate photography. We believe every property deserves to be presented at its best, regardless of budget or technical expertise. By harnessing the power of AI, we make this possible for everyone.

cta.title: Want to learn more?
cta.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you have questions about our service or just want to say hello, get in touch.

contact.title: Get in touch with VastgoedFotoAI.nl
contact.subtitle: Have questions about VastgoedFotoAI.nl? Need help with your property photos? Our team is here to help.

info.responseDescription: We typically respond within 24 hours during business days.
